== Guided Installation ==
The South Dakota LoCo is pleased to offer on-line one-on-one guided installation of Ubuntu for new users.  We hope this service will bring Ubuntu to people with a wider range of computer skills.
If you are interested in taking advantage of this opportunity, please follow this procedure to set up a time for someone to help you install Ubuntu.

1. Create a <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/|Launchpad]]</nowiki> account

2. Open a new question <nowiki>[[https://answers.launchpad.net/ubuntu-southdakota/+addquestion|here]]</nowiki>
 Please include:
* Available times
* Information about your computer (CPU, video card, available memory)
* Special interests (Web server, home network service provider, etc.)
3. A team member will reply to your question with instructions on how to proceed
